Package entity

Class Booking

java.lang.Object
entity.Booking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Booking extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the Booking made by a moviegoer for a movie showing.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • transactionID

      private String transactionID
      Unique transaction identifier of this booking in the format of XXXYYYYMMDDhhmm. XXX refers to the cinema code, YYYYDDMMhhmm refers to the datetime.

    • movieGoer

      private MovieGoer movieGoer
      Moviegoer that made this booking.

    • tickets

      private ArrayList<Ticket> tickets
      List of movie tickets assigned to this booking.

    • transactionTime

      private LocalDateTime transactionTime
      Time when this booking's transaction was completed.

    • showing

      private Showing showing
      Movie showing that this booking is for.

    • price

      private double price
      Price paid for the movie tickets in this booking.

  • Constructor Details

    • Booking

      public Booking(String transactionID, MovieGoer movieGoer, ArrayList<Ticket> tickets, LocalDateTime transactionTime, Showing showing, double price)
      Creates a Booking with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      transactionID - The transaction ID of the booking.
      movieGoer - The moviegoer that made the booking.
      tickets - The list of movie tickets booked.
      transactionTime - The time when the transaction was completed.
      showing - The movie showing that the booking is for.
      price - The price paid for the movie tickets in the booking.

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string containing the booking details. The string includes the transaction ID, moviegoer's email, movie title, movie ID, movie type, showtime, cineplex, cinema, cinema class and price.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String containing this booking's details.
